definitions.definition: to burn the skin with boiling liquid or steam:
examples: I dropped a pan of boiling water and scalded my leg.

definitions.definition: to put something in boiling water or steam in order to make it completely clean:
examples: Scald the needles to sterilize them.

definitions.definition: to heat a liquid until it almost boils:
examples: Scald the milk and then add it to the egg and sugar mixture.

definitions.definition: an injury to the skin caused by boiling liquid or steam
